attributes.action: Introduce a law which makes it illegal to represent oneself online.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A young girl was murdered by a man whom she met online. Countless other people have had their lives disrupted because they have met people online who are not who they say they are. Vulnerable women and men have been let down by supposed single people who are in fact married.
I request that a law be introduced to make it illegal to falsely represent oneself.
I would be grateful for any support for this petition
